name: OpenChat
overview:
OpenChat is a mobile application that allows you to send messages to people nearby. You share interests, ask questions, get automatic notifications about who’s nearby and connect with people without revealing private information such as your mobile number.

Openchat is a mobile applications that instantly connects everybody around them based on their location and their interests.

This application allows people to speak to people around them within a certain vicinity. The purpose of this application is to OpenChat opens a new way of socially interacting with the world networking world of , meeting new people, and building relations. It gives users the opportunity to show off themselves to other people around them with matching interests. OpenChat gives you the opportunity to show off yourself to people who might be interested, always connects you with the right person at the right time, and help you meet people with matching interests and badges.

OpenChat matches people within the proximity according to their badges. Badges help you determine a users main interest and hobbies. are a way of determining a users main interests that they would like to be known by. With this you can prioritise who OpenChat should notify you that is nearby, quickly identify the people that have specific skills, and know who you share strong bonds with. [An example of a badge could be Photography where the user will see other people with the similar prioritized interest as them at the top of the list of people around them.]

Users may also search for people with a specific interest and can be notified when people with the prioritized interest come within a certain proximity.
